title: Large & In Charge With Barry, Derek & Chuck!
itunes:title: Large & In Charge With Barry, Derek & Chuck!
description:
David Garofalo and Mr. Jonathan are in Esteli, Nicaragua so Barry and the boys are left in charge. Chuck gets interviewed, Derek steps into the Asylum and so much more.

We will take a look at cigars and sports and how they go hand in hand, We will take a look at factory tours, and let you know what is in store for the boss and his trusty side kick.

Join us as we light up the Nat Sherman Timeless in the first hour, and the Perdomo Habano Bourbon Barrel Aged in the second hour..
